options: ["Your reservation can't be kept if it is 5 pm.", 'You can only visit the website to get information.', "You shouldn't check out later than 12:00 noon.", 'You have to pay 2280 yuan for a sunshiny suite.']
questions: Which of the following is TRUE according to the advertisement above?
article:
